other_tests.findings: heterogeneous attenuation throughout the liver, normal pancreas and spleen, incompletely characterized left adrenal nodule (9 x 15 mm), extensive diverticulosis of the colon with focal fat stranding and bowel wall thickening consistent with possible small intramural abscess (1.0 x 0.7 cm), no evidence of perforation or fistula, enlarged fibroid uterus.
MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA (>= 3 COLONY TYPES), CONSISTENT WITH SKIN AND/OR GENITAL CONTAMINATION.
